Index.title: Welcome to Soul Comfort Site
Index.dailyQuote: Every dawn is a new beginning.
Index.treeHoleDescription: Share your thoughts and feelings with our empathetic AI companion.

TreeHole.title: AI Tree Hole
TreeHole.description: A safe space to share your thoughts and feelings. Our AI is here to listen and support you.
TreeHole.disclaimer: Note: This is an AI assistant and not a substitute for professional mental health support. If you're experiencing serious issues, please seek help from qualified professionals.
TreeHole.startConversation: Start a conversation by typing a message below...
TreeHole.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Tree Hole. I'm here to listen and support you.
TreeHole.maintenanceMessage: The AI chat feature is currently under technical maintenance. We're working to improve service quality. Please try again later.

Chat.startConversation: Start a conversation by typing a message below...
Chat.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again later.
Chat.limitReachedMessage: You've reached your free usage limit. Upgrade to continue the conversation and enjoy unlimited access.

Modes.listeningModeDesc: AI will only listen to your thoughts without giving evaluations or suggestions
Modes.comfortModeDesc: AI will provide gentle support and suggestions to help you feel at ease
Modes.challengeModeDesc: AI will help you challenge thought patterns and provide new perspectives
Modes.debateModeDesc: AI will engage in beneficial debate to help you strengthen your reasoning skills
Modes.listeningModeMessage: Switched to Listening Mode. I'll focus on listening to your thoughts without offering evaluations or suggestions.
Modes.comfortModeMessage: Switched to Comfort Mode. I'll provide gentle support and suggestions to help you feel at ease.
Modes.challengeModeMessage: Switched to Mind Challenge Mode. I'll help you challenge thought patterns and provide new perspectives.
Modes.debateModeMessage: Switched to Debate Training Mode. I'll engage in beneficial debate to help you strengthen your reasoning skills.

UpgradePage.title: Upgrade Your Plan
UpgradePage.description: Choose the package that's right for you and unlock more features.
UpgradePage.loginPrompt: Please log in to view available packages.
UpgradePage.errorLoadPackages: Could not load packages. Please try again later.
UpgradePage.errorPaymentInit: Failed to initialize payment. Please try again.
UpgradePage.errorInvalidUrl: Invalid payment link received. Please contact support.
UpgradePage.noPackages: No packages available at this time. Please check back later.

Payment.paymentSuccessDescription: Your payment has been completed and credits have been added to your account.
Payment.errorMissingParams: Missing required parameters during payment processing.
Payment.errorPaymentIncomplete: Payment was not completed. Please try again.
Payment.errorVerificationFailed: Payment verification failed. Please contact support.
Payment.errorServerError: Server error while processing payment. Please try again later.

Login.title: Sign In or Sign Up
Login.subtitle: Enter your details below to access your account
Login.link_signin: Already have an account? Sign in
Login.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
Login.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
Login.login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
Login.signup_failed: Sign up failed. Please try again.
